name: PardikSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights.”
”Alexa, dim the ceiling light by seventy percent.”
”Alexa, activate movie scene.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enhance your smart home experience with Pardik and the Pardik System.
Now, effortlessly control a wide range of devices including switches, dimmers, plugs, lights, TVs, ACs, fans, and various scenes, all integrated seamlessly through the Pardik smart home system. Simply use voice commands via Alexa for convenient control. 
Before starting, make sure you have an Pardik account and at least one Pardik HyPanel device in your home. 
To enable this functionality, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App and then log in with your Pardik credentials. This will link your account and allow Alexa to discover and control your Pardik-integrated devices and scenes.
